"Mom! Mom!" Tom and Tina both giggled, tugging on their mother's shirt. Linda forced a smile while groaning, rubbing her absolutely enormous belly. After she gave birth to her twins, Tom and Tina, the doctors warned Linda that her genetics seemed to predispose her to multiples and she could be carrying even more next time. The news initially made Linda both incredibly scared for her health, but also greatly aroused. Linda loved being pregnant and couldn't imagine what carrying triplets or more would be like.

She resisted getting pregnant again, sticking with her common sense and deciding that it wouldn't be worth the risks to get some momentary thrills. Her husband didn't seem to care much about safe sex and, sure enough, Linda got pregnant again and he left. When Linda found out she was carrying sextuplets, her heart was pounding. Then doctors told her they noticed another anomaly in her physical condition that would actually allow her to carry the six babies full term!

The doctors were a little off, though. Linda was now 12 months pregnant with her six babies, all of whom were still plenty active. Her twins tugged more and more on her shirt as Linda struggled to do the house's chores, her unborn children kicking and punching her, from the front of her belly where it felt very nice and motherly, to her intestines and bladder, which made her want to rush off to the bathroom. Her shirt didn't even cover all of her belly. Not even close. This glimpse at her bare fullness let Tom and Tina watch their little brothers and sisters move around inside Linda, making them "ooh" and "aah."

"What is it, kids?" Linda panted, waddling slowly, a bandana tied around her hair like an old, 50s housewife to keep the hair and sweat out of her eyes. Despite the stress she was under, Linda still managed to rub her belly with one hand, both to quiet her brood and also because she loved the feeling.

"Tom says the babies are in your tummy, but I said that's where food goes!" Tina said, looking up at her mother with big, curious eyes. Even looking up, all she could really see was Linda's smooth underbelly. "Where do babies come from?"

Linda smiled sweetly, deciding she did enough cleaning for the day. "Well, sweetie, the babies grow inside the momma here," she said, patting her planet-like bulge.

"Yeah, but where is that?" Tom said in his inappropriately loud kid voice. "I mean, when I get hungry, around here is where I feel it. So the babies are in your tummy?"

Linda sighed and rolled her shirt up some more. "No, no, I wouldn't do that to your siblings. Moms have a place inside them called the womb and it's close to where the stomach is. And that's where the babies grow."

"Womb," Tina said softly, exploring the sound of the word in her mouth, reaching out and rubbing Linda's enormous belly. "So when I grow up, I'll have a womb too?"

"That's right," Linda said, wondering if she passed the same baby-factory gene onto her daughter.

Tom was now rubbing Linda's belly now too, both rubbing the bottom part, which happened to be the most sensitive part. Linda blushed and resisted making too lewd of a sound. "Can Mom sit down?"

Tom and Tina nodded, following Linda to the couch where she lay on her back, legs hanging off, belly far, far in the air. Linda closed her eyes and cooed softly.

Her twins continued to stroke and rub Linda's belly, and by consequence, her thighs, getting nothing but groans from Linda who also had to deal with her kicking and thrashing brood inside her. From her seat on the couch, Linda could look over and see the clock and saw that it was time for work. She struggled to lift herself off of the couch now, Tom and Tina relentless in their belly-massaging.

"You have to go, Mom?" Tina said, pinching Linda's popped-out belly button as her mother tried to stand up straight.

"Yes, dear," Linda said, face bright red, with tiny beads of sweat as she tried to get up. God, she loved being pregnant but it had its downsides. But even in the daily struggle with her mammoth belly and overdue unborn children, Linda found things to take great pleasure in. She was probably the only woman who was getting to experience this sensation. "Please, you two need to let Mom get to work. I've told you before: Ms. Jenna from next door will be over to look after you while I'm gone. Okay?"

"Oh-kay," Tom said, rolling his eyes. "Mom, Johnny from my class...his Mom has a baby in her belly too. She's not as big as you, but could she look after us one day?"

Linda couldn't help but chuckle. "So you kids don't miss your Mom, just her belly, is that right?"

"It's so much fun!" Tina laughed. Linda smiled and got her bag by the door, waddling out, one hand under to support her size.

"I'll see you soon, Tom, Tina," Linda said. "Behave, okay? Don't get into *oof* trouble." One of her six babies delivered a poorly-timed kick as Linda made her way outside and head for the bus.

Like every time she got on the bus lately, Linda got looks from every single person on board. She had to file a suit with the city to get her regular bus to reinforce her shocks so someone with as big a belly as her could ride without damaging the vehicle. On the bus, which was always crowded, Linda could feel strangers taking advantage of the commotion to sneak belly rubs. She couldn't see them, thanks to both the packed ride and the sheer amount of space her belly took up. Sometimes, she would get on and see people smirk as they refused to give her a seat, preferring instead to see the impressive sight of an overdue pregnant woman with sextuplets try and hold onto the handlebar and support her belly.

The ride was a few miles and Linda was lucky enough to get a seat today, holding her purse and bag for work on top of her belly, its size providing her with a nice shelf. The man next to her was not even bothering to read his newspaper as he watched her belly's surface kick and squirm with activity. "Does it hurt with so many in there?" He asked.

Linda winced as one got her in the bladder. "Sometimes, but I still wouldn't give this up for the world." The bus slowed and Linda made it to her stop. "Excuse me."

After the long, grope-filled trip off the bus was complete, Linda waddled to work. Most women anywhere near her condition would be staying home, but Linda insisted on finding a job to support the family increase she was carrying. But, with her husband being the previous breadwinner and having no marketable skills aside from her impressive fertility, Linda could only get work at one place.

She entered the club's side entrance and made it to her changing room, the other girls there smiling at her. "Good to see you again, Linda," one of the women, Lola, smiled. "12 months now, huh?"

"12 months and one week," Linda smiled, getting into the room and drawing the curtain as she undressed. "I'm sure these little ones will come out at some point, though."

"Hopefully," Lola laughed. "Any bigger and you won't be able to fit on the stage."

Linda found work at a slightly run-down strip club that had to be re-done as a place for "exotic dances." Linda found that she could make more money doing "private dances," which took place in a lounge-sized room with a stage and seats. Nudity was not allowed, but for tips, Linda would do it anyway. Excessive touching and especially sex were also banned, but Linda found that her "customers" didn't care. Usually, they would leave bigger tips afterward, but not always. Plenty of people would "dine and dash," having sex with an impossibly huge pregnant woman and then leave without adding to her compensation.

"Well, I think I've got another half a year before that happens," Linda said, walking from behind the curtain in her skimpy red bikini. "Still, it doesn't feel like I'm getting any closer to giving birth."

"Well, as long as you look like this, we'll get more attention," Lola giggled, patting the sides of Linda's belly and heading out to do her own shift. "Good luck, hon."

"Yeah, you too," Linda sighed, walking down the hall to the entrance to her room. Inside, there was already a college aged guy sitting eagerly, sweatshirt and baseball cap on.

"Holy shit!" he laughed when Linda struggled on stage. "You're...really as big as they say."

"Mmmhmm," Linda purred, running her hands over her belly. "I'm glad you like what you see." Linda got no true thrills out of doing this, but learned to fake it quite well. She started gyrating her hips and belly, running her hands everywhere, bending back and showing her plump ass at times too. Thankfully, this guy seemed like one of the more well-behaved voyeurs, which made it easier on her. To secure a nice tip, Linda waddled forward and jutted out her belly. "Want to feel?"

"Oh yeah!" the college boy said, rushing forward to rub Linda's belly. "Damn, you're so big you could fit a full-grown person in here!" Linda giggled and sighed, letting him get his hands full of belly. The light soon went off on the side of the walls. "Time's up...well, it was worth it," he said, stuffing some cash in between Linda's equally-swollen breasts.

Linda took her tip and put it in a little box off the stage to keep it hidden and safe during her shift. "Alright, good start," Linda said to herself. "Who's next?"

Her luck ran out as four laughing girls walked in, clearly drunk and wearing sorority sweaters. "Wooow, you're bigger than the rumors," the apparent ringleader, a dolled-up brunette, said, running her hands all over Linda's belly.

"Thank you," Linda smiled, starting to sway her hips to dance. One of the taller girls got behind her and put her hands on both sides of Linda's ass.

"Mmm, you're big in all the right places," the tall girl laughed, leaning down to kiss Linda on the back of her neck. "Well, let's have our fun now." She took the knot on the back of Linda's bikini and pulled it apart, letting the pregnant woman's breasts hang naked.

Linda moaned softly as the ringleader began to pull down her underwear. "Hey, we're paying you aren't we? Just relax and let us get our money's worth."

In came a guy, not particularly attractive, who headed right for Linda as she readjusted her top. "Hi there, sweetie," Linda forced out as he got on stage.

"Here's $100 bucks on top of what I'm already paying the club for this dance," he said, holding out the money. "I want to have sex."

"Mom, where do babies come from?" a small boy named Tom asked.

The mother, Linda, smiled and gently stroked her son's cheek. She frowned for a moment, clearly remembering and missing the time she had Tim in her womb...sleeping. It was such a blissful moment. She wasn't sure when she would ever return to that feeling again, especially when her husband had enough kids. Before she could daydream, she snapped out of it and decided to quench her son's curiosity which happened to be the most common question kids ask these days.

Without giving too much details as she did not want to damage her son's innocence, she looked down at her flat belly and patted it. Her son looked down and quirked an eyebrow, not understanding.

"You see...babies come from the womb of a mother..."

"The belly? I thought that's where food goes?" he asked, clearly not understanding the difference between womb and belly.

Linda found it amusing and quite adorable. She giggled and shook her head.

"No sweetie, there's a special 'belly' where the baby is taken care of until he is ready..."

Tom's eyes widened and glimmered, understanding a little now even though there weren't a lot of details put into the explanation. He put up his hands into a fist and eagerly jumped up and down, shaking his fists by his side.

"Cool! Can I see it? Can I?" he asked, giddy.

Linda smile falter and she wished she could tell him easily that he could...oh god, how she wish she could...she couldn't though. With a drop in her usual motherly and sweet tone, she shook her head sadly.

"Sorry sweetie, but...nobody can go back in after leaving..."

...nobody...

---------------------------------------

Tom woke up, his eye lids slowly opening there way to allow the dim light of sun from his window to enter. He stared at the ceiling with a frown.

It happened again...

...the same dream...and each time, he feels a cold disappointment filling him.

At the age of 17, turning 18 in a month, Tim was a teenager with black, straight hair, brown eyes, and a perfectly oval face with a few freckles over his cheeks. He was neither scrawny or fat; however, he didn't have any note-worthy muscles.

As a student in his last year of high school, he had already worked and gotten admitted to the college he wanted to go to. He was good in his grades, not as good as he wished, but good enough for his parents. Really though, he happened to procrastinate a lot, but when it came to deadlines, he'd quickly shape himself up.

He had a sister who was the same age as him named Tina. She and him were on pretty good terms, but part of that reason was probably because she respected his privacy and he did the same. Other than that, they hardly fought...a few times perhaps, but its to be expected when you're sharing a house with the same person of age and not to mention, the opposite gender.

Just like Tom, she had black hair and brown eyes. Typically, she tied her long hair into a pony tail so that she didn't have to worry about it getting in the way. At the same time, she also had the same build as him...which was okay for her since she was a girl, though he preferred it he could at least build up some muscle tone. She was also flat-chested. One time, Tom had made a joke regarding that...

...Never again.

Aside from that, he had the feeling that she was more sociable than him. She denied it before, but he could tell since they go to the same school together. She was like a magnet, attracting girls and boys. Tom would never understand why she was so popular. As for him, he had several friends that he'd go hang out with and perhaps watch some late night football. For him, popularity never came as a concern. Probably because he was a boy.

As for their parents, they were on good terms. His mother, Linda, was in her mid-thirties and considering the dream he had, she had not changed that much at all. Sometimes stress could be seen in her eyes, but other times, she was the sweetest and most-caring mother ever. From his talk with his friends, he had to admit how grateful he was to be born into this family compared to his other friends' family.

If you wanted to talk about how attractive their mother was, well...she was once a bikini swimsuit model for a magazine before she met their father. If that didn't tell people who attractive she was, then those people obviously didn't look at the magazines and see the unspoken requirements for applicants...seriously.

His father was actually his mother's agent before they agreed to marry. His father always bragged how lucky he was and teased us that we may never get as lucky as he was. Personally, Tom could care less, but he supposed it would be nice to marry a model...after carefully examining the personality, that is. Now, in order to support the family and because his mother wouldn't allow him to continue in the model industry, he became a financial adviser. A pretty big and dull contrast from his previous work. He didn't seem to regret it though as it seemed that supporting the family made him happy enough.

Tom sighed. Speaking of whether or not he'll be happy, he looked to his clock to see the time and date.

What was the date?

1212.content:
Tom's body froze and his mind filled with dread as he saw the date. It was Monday...fucking Monday.

...which meant he had to go back to school again...

...and it also meant that he would be counting the days until the weekend again...

...well, fuck.

Groaning to himself, he laid flat against his bed and smothered a pillow over his head, not wanting to think about the day and furthermore, the days he had to look towards. Mondays should be banned...seriously, it was a heart attack towards people like him who had to go to school.

"Tom! Get up! It's time to go to school!"

The voice could only belong to his fraternal twin sister, Tina. She of course, got up early unlike him. He didn't feel like that was something to be proud of. If his sister wanted to be Mr. Monday's pet, then by all means, but don't bring the brother into it.

"God, you're always like this when it's Monday! I'm coming in," she declared and then opened your door. There she saw him cuddled up in a blanket with a pillow over his head. She shook her head and sighed. She knew the drill and what to do. Slowly she grabbed the blankets that was covering him. Tom quickly held on to the blanket as if it was his dear life.

"My sweet, sweet sister. Please be reasonable to a fellow rebel of Monday...at the very least...five minutes..." Tom pleaded underneath his pillow.

Tina narrowed her eyes and the sighed. "Fine...I'll give you five minutes, but if you aren't ready, then I promise I'll kick your ass!"

"Understood fellow pet of Monday," Tom replied jokingly.

Tina didn't seem to be impressed with his antics as she groaned and rolled her eyes. Thankfully, she left his room but he knew that she would keep her word which meant he was in deep shit if he wasn't up in five minutes.

Though he loved his sister, he sometimes wondered what demonic world she came from.

Oh yeah...Monday.

Groggily, he relented the comfort of his bed and slowly rose out of his sheets. He shouldn't have said five minutes...really, that wasn't a lot of time. Although, he wasn't sure if his sister would take too kindly to anything more than five minutes.

Mumbling, he slowly shifted his feet against the carpet of his room and out into the hallways of their house. He did the usual hygienic tasks he had to do in the morning, each minute becoming more and more aware and less sleepy.

When he went to the kitchen, he saw his sister smirking at him, happy to see that he listened to her...that little, sweet demon. He also saw his lovely anti-aging mom cooking up some eggs, presumably for him considering his sister was almost finished with his breakfast.

"Good morning, mom," he greeted.

His mother looked behind her as she flipped an egg. A warm smile came to her face. "Morning sweetie. Did you have a good rest and dream?"

He blinked, once again reminded of his mother and the womb. Quickly shuttering it out of his mind, he just shrugged which basically meant no and yes. He then heard his sister groan.

"Great, now I have to wait for you," his sister groaned.

Tom grinned. "Because I'm adorable, aren't I?"

His sister didn't say anything and just rolled her eyes. Since Tom didn't want to get punched, he figured that he would stop messing with his sister. It was only fair though...as an ally to Monday and an enemy to his.

His mother finished cooking the egg and set a plate out for him to eat with a simple over easy egg and some toast. He wasted no time in digging in while his sister watched between him and the clock.

When he finally finished eating the egg, Tina wasted no time as she grabbed her brother's wrist and pulled him off his chair. "Come on, we don't want to be late!"

Tom sighed but didn't resist realizing it would be pointless to go against rushing. She was always like this in the morning. Probably because she had friends that she wanted to catch up with. As for you, your friends never came early. They took their time which was how you were wanting to do...that is, until your sister came.

Linda watched as her daughter and son left quickly in a rush..or rather, her daughter was in the rushing mood. She waved them away until the front door shut and locked. She then sighed and put an hand to her cheek.

"They grow up so fast...I can't believe they're both turning eighteen in a month!"

She frowned, feeling some disappointment. "It feels as if they were in my womb yesterday..."
1212.title: Monday...9:00 AM...Fuck.

choices: This is probably some kind of joke. Tom relents and opens the mysterious box.
Tom leaves and ignores Orefeli, leaving to school.
12121.content:
Tom reluctantly followed her sister to the local bus. From there, they would get on and travel a mile or two away from their house. It wasn't that bad and the bus came by regularly which was always a good thing.

They reached said bus stop which was only a few blocks away from their home and outside the neighborhood. They saw the bus already stopped and people getting on, both old, young, and students like them.

"Let's hurry!" his sister pushed, running ahead.

Tom frowned and yawned. God this was a bad day. He just hoped it didn't get any worse.

...

Tom realized he made the number one mistake. By hoping it wouldn't get any worse, he was foreshadowing something bad to come.

'Well, I'm right fucked, aren't I?' he thought jokingly. He took his time walking and reached the bus before it could close its doors. His sister frowned, not pleased with the lazy and tired behavior of his brother. Seeing an open spot next to his sister, he sat down and sighed. His sister nudged him, grabbing his attention. He was met with disapproving eyes.

"You know...It's clear that you hate the start of weeks like this, but seriously, don't you look forward to hanging out with your friends?" she asked.

Tom scoffed which resulted in his sister furrowing her eyebrows.

"Sorry to disappoint you sis, but sleep and bed always come before my friends," he replied.

Tina opened her mouth for a moment in disbelief and then shut it. "You're horrible, you know that?"

"Bite me," Tom replied back.

His sister sighed and that was the end of their conversation. Normally, Tom would've took a quick nap but since he was next to his sister, that was not possible. He allowed his mind to wander in the mean time.

It went back to the recurring dream he was having...about his mother and womb. He wasn't as innocent as he was when he was a little kid. He knew that in order to have a kid, you had to have sex and impregnate the female. From their, the male's sperm would travel, competing with other sperms until the first one...and sometimes, more than one would reach the female's egg. It's all part of mother nature...at least in terms of mammals. He wasn't sure for other types.

Yet something bugged him...a lot. The feeling of being in a womb...his mother's womb. He couldn't remember what it felt like. How could he? He wasn't aware when he was an infant so there was no way to remember something like that. Nobody would be able to remember being in a womb. It was impossible, right?

He sighed. This was so stupid. Why was he worrying about something as trivial as that? Could he really be that curious? Or was he just going insane? Why worry about the past when you could focus on the future? Why did he have dreams that made him depressed whenever he thought about being unable to go back to the womb?

Why?

Tom obviously couldn't answer himself. All he could do was hope that this was just a phase that he was passing through. He looked to his sister who was gazing off into the window and the blurry buildings due to the bus' speed. What was his sister thinking about? Who knew.

-------


The bus stopped and soon, a majority of the people, mostly students who went to school with them, left. A wind brushed past his face and he frowned. They were not too far from home and it was already becoming windy?

He looked up to the sky and saw it was becoming grey. Was it going to rain? Really, It was a Monday and it was going to rain. Way to go mother nature...way to add to the whole drama of the day.

He closed his eyes and sighed. Opening them and looking forward, he was suddenly met by a person wrapped in a brown cloak. Tom widened his eyes and jumped, his heart beating fast at how subtle this person appeared before him. He...or she...looked like they belong to this cult...or perhaps the old church. What was unnerving though was this strange clothed person was staring at him.

He looked at his fellow students who seemed to not notice this person staring at you. In fact, your sister seemed to ignore you and the staring robed person as she skipped ahead and met up with her friends. Were they that oblivious to this guy who was dressed so differently from the students and from the adults going to work in their formal attire?

"Tom...Tom Marcelo...is it not?"

Tom jumped again as you heard his name. it was definitely female and it was coming from this creepy robbed person. It was apparently female but he couldn't see for sure as her hood covered and shadowed her face. All he could see was her lips which was fine and smooth. She was more than likely a female.

"Y-yes, who are you?" Tom confirmed and asked, warily. This was definitely not creepy or weird in any shape or form.

"I am Orefeli Beqwa," she introduced herself and then pull down her hood.

Tom's eyes widened. She looked to be in her early twenties, a little older than him if that were the case. Her hair was cut short, just an inch off her slender shoulders. What was a bit dazzling and strange was that it was pure white. It definitely attracted his attention so perhaps that was the reason for her cover-up. Her face was slender with a pointy chin and her nose short. Her eyes...were blue but...they looked pretty tired or rather...lazy. Besides that, if she wasn't beautiful, then Tom didn't know how else he could describe her.

Quickly, he shook his head. This was not the time to get entranced. She obviously wanted him for something, but what?

"What do you want from me?" he asked, keeping his voice hard enough that it wouldn't indicate he was taken in by the woman's appearance. The obvious truth was that he was.

The woman looked down with her half-opened eyes and pulled out something from her robes. It was...some kind of black box or container and then held it out for him. She looked at him without blinking an eye or making any form of expression. Tom could see that she was pretty much emotionless. She also seemed a bit stoic. Weird.

Taking a look at the box, he raised an eyebrow. Was she offering it to him? Quickly he pushed it away.

"Sorry, I don't take gifts from strangers," he stated.

She didn't seem to care as she pushed it forward at him.

"Open it." she ordered in a flat voice.

Tom twitched an eye as he pushed back again. Didn't she heard him the first time?

"Look, I don't want it!" he yelled.

She didn't seem to care about whether he wanted it or not. She pushed forward again. What was with this strange woman?!

"Open it." she repeated.

1532221222211.content:
Epilogue


It had been nearly 15 years since Tara had absorbed her family, and became pregnant with them. When growing up, she initially had a hard time explaining to her romantic interests how she was the mother of 5 children who were just a few years younger than herself. So, she decided to give up on that angle, and began using a more reasonable "they're my younger siblings, our parents left us" story.

And eventually, it worked. Tara, now 23, had been married for a year to a man she met named Caleb, and the two lived happily in Tara's childhood home. Caleb was at first suspicions of Tara's relationship with her "siblings", but over time, grew to love them as much as she did. Tara herself wasn't aiming on having any more kids anytime soon. Raising five teenagers on the salary of two early-twenty year-olds was a pain as-is.

Tara had once considered sending at least two of the children to live with her aunt Maggie, but decided against it, to prevent the awkwardness of having to explain where the kids came from. So, her and Caleb were essentially stuck with them. Out of the five, Tara's favorite was probably her daughter Diane. As her name suggested, she was the most like Tara's mother Dianna. Sometimes, Tara wondered if she was Dianna reincarnated.

Tara's only son, Ben, had been trying for weeks to persuade his "sister" to teach him how to drive so he could "hang with his older female friends after school". But each time he tried, Tara would swiftly deny his pleas. This of course amused the twins, Abigail and Alexis. Alexis was more of a bookworm, often gluing her eyes to her laptop screen, spending long nights reading unique stories she found on the internet.

Abigail was the opposite of her twin, often making time out of her teenage schedule to tease her brother, occasionally dragging Alexis into her shenanigans against her will. Despite how cruel these acts may get, Tara knew that ultimately, it was all in good fun. However, it was her daughter Rose that often found herself as the object of Tara's interest, and for multiple reasons.

For starters, Rose was more anti-social than her siblings, and had strange interests. Once, Tara had to pay $75 to get Rose out of some weird cult she found herself joining. They called themselves the "Children of the Fallen", and were convinced that they could use the body of a female virgin to bring back some long-dead whacko as her child. And of course, the virgin they chose was Rose.

Luckily, Tara was able to put an end to their actions before Rose could have been impregnated, but ever since then, Rose has seemed to almost despise Tara, and has taken several actions to isolate herself from her, as well as putting charges on Tara's credit card for what Rose called "ritual materials". A condom was definitely not what Tara would classify as a ritual material, however.

One saturday afternoon, after Tara had returned home from the grocery store, and put away all she had bought, she went to her bedroom, and discovered that her diary, the one she had been writing in since she was 6, was missing. Which was odd, nobody in the house really had any reason to take her old diary. And so, Tara sat on the edge of her bed for a few minutes, wondering why her diary was missing..and then it dawned on her. She quickly rushed out of her room, and ran to the room belonging to Rose. She banged on the door, but heard nothing. So, Tara made her way in, uninvited.

What Tara saw was a familiar sight, for sure, but it still managed to surprise her. In the middle of the room was Rose, who herself was sitting in the middle of a crimson ritual circle. That wasn't new, but what was new was the open diary in her lap.

"So..you pretty much ate your family? That's pretty cool...mom." Rose looked at Tara and smirked. Tara's dark secret was now out, and Rose could easily use this as a form of blackmail. "Rose, give me the diary," Tara stared at her daughter, her mind racing. "Nope..but you're going to give me those pills of yours."

"Rose, I can't do tha-" Tara was sharply interrupted. "So, should I tell Caleb about this? Or maybe your boss, or the rest of the family." Tara sighed, and hung her head in defeat. "Fine, I'll get the pills." Tara got up, walked to the bathroom, and took our a small locked box from the medicine cabinet. She then returned to her daughter.

"Well? Open it." And Tara did just that, using a key on her keyring. She took out a tube, containing two pills, and handed it to Rose. Rose smirked, rubbing the pills with the palms of her hands. "How do I know if these work? Maybe I should absorb someone to test it." Tara's eyes widened, and she backed away. Her life was finally going right, and Rose couldn't mess it up for her now. Rose laughed, pocketing the pills. "Why waste it on you? My true family needs me."

As Rose walked out of her room, Tara called after her, "what family?" she asked. To which Rose responded, "the Children of the Fallen." It was then that Tara realized that the cycle would only continue from here, and that's what worried her most of all.

“And now light the candles,” Rose muttered to herself as she took the taper around to each of the candles around the black chalk shape she had drawn on the floor.

With that finished, she went back to the book she had found in that odd little store she occasionally went to. Tucking a loose lock of her crimson hair behind her ear, she went over the faded and worn text in the tome.

It had been mere happenstance that she had found the book, or it found her considering that it had tumbled off the top of the shelf when she put something else back. Considering the wave of dust that came down with the book, it had obviously been tucked away up there for an extremely long time. The rotund redhead hadn’t been able to make out much of the text, but what little bit she could read made the book seem like it contained spells, rituals, and the like. Scoffing, she almost put the book back when one particular section caught her eye. Like the rest, it was hard to read, but what she could make out seem to mention things like “change one’s life” as well as she thought had to be repeated references to pregnancy. Just the chance of that was enough to convince her to purchase the book and head home to see about it.

She had always been attracted to the idea of pregnancy – just the thought of her mother pregnant with her twin siblings during her own childhood bought a smile to Rose’s face – and now this book might be just what she needed. It had taken her several weeks to get all of the materials the ritual required, but now it was finally time to give it a shot. Grabbing a knife she took from her kitchen, she walked to the design on the floor, and winced as she pricked her finger and squeezed out several drops of blood into the center. Sucking the minor wound, she put the knife back down and picked up the book. Rose then started to read out the chant, it was choppy and halting at first, but after several passes through it was smoother and quicker. The chant was gibberish to her ears, but on the fifth pass she thought she felt a slight breeze despite there being no source. On the next loop, it almost looked like there was a pale glow from the supposedly ordinary chalk. It was on the seventh run through where all heck broke loose.

When she heard a loud crack, Rose looked up from the book in time to see the glow in the chalk become almost blindingly bright. Forcing her eyelids to be as barely cracked as possible, she managed to see an glowing orb appearing over the chalk drawing. The orb grew bigger and bigger as Rose backed away from it, her instinct to run away quickly ramping up and taking control. Just as she was about to turn away and dash for the door, the orb surged forward, slamming into the redhead and knocking her flat on her back. An electric tingle shot throughout her body, leaving her fingers and toes feeling a bit numb. The feeling seemed to concentrate in her torso, especially around her stomach and breasts, growing to an annoying itchy feeling, but her arms didn’t seem to be fully under her control to deal with that uncomfortable sensation. The itching soon turned into a wave of heat that bloomed within her, making her feel like she was going to burst into flames at any moment. Her vision was swimming with spots as well, though behind them she could see how the room had gone dark again, too dark for the candles to even still be burning.

Suddenly, Rose opened her eyes, she was still staring up at the dark ceiling, lying on her back in the side room she had cleaned up for the spell or whatever it was supposed to be. She vaguely remembered the orb of energy, the tickling itchy feeling, and the heat, but she felt completely normal now. Better than normal now that she really thought about it. She felt peaceful and content in a way she hadn’t really felt before, and that was even considering whatever that hallucination or whatever it was that she had seen before passing out.

Sitting up with a groan, she saw that the candles had indeed gone out and the chalk lines were smudged. The spell obviously hadn’t worked though, so with a grunt she climbed back to her feet and walked away, leaving the book where it had fallen when she started backing away. She was suddenly feeling tired, so she would see about cleaning up the next day. The fleshy woman stripped down and took a quick shower before retiring to bed.

That night her dreams were flooded with incredibly vivid dreams and without exception they all featured pregnancy front and center. Some featured women with ordinary pregnancies, but others involved pregnancies far beyond what should have been possible, reaching into the region of a dozen or more unborn children or pregnancies that involved something other than what they should have. Sometimes these dreams featured Rose center stage, though others were focused on other pregnant woman and girls.

Birds chirping and sunlight finding a gap in the curtain stirred the woman from the limbo of dreams. With a groan, she turned over and tried to get comfortable again, but it was to no avail. She felt mildly queasy, but it wasn’t anything too bad, and as she remembered that she didn’t eat anything after that failure with the spell, she mentally hand waved any concern away. She was dimly aware that something seemed to be off, but couldn’t quite place her finger on it, but figured that she would figure it out soon enough. Stephanie glanced up at the mirror over the sink, her eyes tracing the thick black locks that swept down over her slender yet curvy frame. The young woman had worked hard throughout her high school years, but when it came to getting a place of her own away from her barely present parents, minimum wage wasn’t going to be enough. They were holding examinations for prospective applicants, and those that were accepted would get a rather large amount of money regularly. Stephanie couldn’t pass up a chance like that. So she traveled to the local branch of the company, went through the exam and was accepted within a matter of days. It all happened so fast that Stephanie was more than a little shocked, but the first portion of the money was soon added to her account and helped ease her monetary woes.

Today she had been called into the Gaia Corp branch again and was given the bottle that now rested in her hand as well as a sheaf of forms that she would have to fill out regularly. The company representative had been more than a little vague about what the little pink pills were supposed to do, and what she had said had been too technical for Stephanie to follow. She had already used most of the money they had given to her already though, so it wasn’t like she could back out. She shoved any lingering misgivings aside as she twisted the top off and fished out one of the pills, before popping it into her mouth and swallowing. Setting the bottle down on the counter, she headed for the main portion of her small apartment, remembering that she had to fill out the first form once she had taken the first pill.

With that finished, the young woman sat back in her chair. A hand drifted down to her belly; it felt a little queasy for some reason. She frowned again as the feeling only got worse.

Both Gloria and Fiona were very well aware of the Birds and the bees. Gloria doesn't admit it aloud, but she misses being pregnant. And Fiona, having hit puberty recently, is curious what pregnancy feels like. Though, she's not wanting to lose her virginity to sex at her age. So, her urge to be pregnant will have to wait til she feels ready.

Gloria's urge to be pregnant again, or Fiona's curiosity to pregnant, may be sated. You're just not sure which one you want to ask about where babies come from.

Getting back to the present time. Your mom has dropped you off at Troy's house. Ensure you had everything. PJs, extra goodnights and pull-ups, as well as diapers, since you switched back and forth between the two during daytime hours. Extra set of clothing. You favorite blanket and pillow, and your plush Grwolith, since you loved Pokemon like Troy, and Arcanine was your favorite. She also packed you a bottle, though it was empty, and there were some other things in the bag she had brought with you, but you hadn't seen what they were. She whispered something to Gloria, and Gloria nodded and smiled. You weren't sure what they had said to each other, but as you mom hugged you goodbye, you were then picked up by Gloria, which didn't bother you none, since it was a normal act that happened regularly when you visited, as Fiona carried your things into the house. They then headed with you to Troys room. When the three of you entered, you were greeted to......
155232212522.title: Sleep Over.

1552322125222.content:
Still being very young, there were not many people you knew, and Troy was one of few you did know, and he was your best friend. And there was one secret you didn't tell anyone, outside your two families, that you both shared. You both loved to be treated as if you were still tiny babies. This didn't bother your mothers none. They found it quite adorable, and encouraged it. It meant they could have more of a bond with you boys. And Tina would indulge every once in a while, but sometimes, she liked to play the older sister, as if she was far older then you, like Fiona was to Troy. You two didn't mind that at all.

The only downer was James, your dad. He didn't approve of this regressive behavior, saying you should act your age. Apparently, to his standard, 4 year olds acted far better then a baby. True most were potty training, but their needs for attention were the same as when they were babies to begin with, but James was just that dad, thinking it was uncouth to have you play baby. So Linda and Gloria had set it up so that the baby time would usually be held at Gloria's place. But sadly, the mothers couldn't always get time to do this together with you two, and took turns sometimes in mothering you both in your baby time,

This "Baby TIme" had included diapering up for the whole day, with no use of the potty for you two, so changes were a must. Troy's room had been converted into a nursery, big enough to let you be babies at your age. There was cribs, three to be exact, since Tina was babied sometimes, the floor was completely plushed up as well as the walls, so, there was no face planting into hard floor or wall. The television in the room had been made to look very stylish to make it a baby boy looking TV. Now they did let you watch normal kid cartoons, and play normal kid games. But whenever you two were able to have sleepovers like this, the only meal you got was either from Gloria or Fiona breastfeeding you, so they could both feel like they were mothering you, if Linda wasn't around. And there was an area in the nursery for that as well. In fact, this nursery dwarfed many other nurseries by comparison.

As you were carried into the nursery, Troy exclaimed, "TOM!" He jumped up into Gloria's arms, and the two of you hugged. Gloria then asked, "Well, do boys want to......"

155232212531.content:
While you and tina, and some of the other kids were human, all the caretakers at this Daycare were Centaur mares, some of the kids being taken care of were centaurs themselves. This was of course normal for all of you. It was the world you lived in. You knew of these creatures since you could start retaining memories. And they had been around since the dawn of civilization. Though Centaurs refrained from warfare these days, they did interact with humans all around the world.

The care takers here were:

Rhea: The tallest, and strongest of the mares, with brunette hair and tail, Cacajun human skin, and cooper brown fur for her horse portion. She DD sized breasts. Breast almost as big as your head, as well as DD sized mare teats on her mare portion of her body. She was very gentile, and caring to all the children, and very calm.

Azura: She was the leanest among the mares. Very playful. She had Native-Ameican human skin, black hair and tail, and black fur for her mare coat. Her breasts were about D size, as were her mare teats.

Jennavive: She was lean and strong, but certainly not at the level of Rhea and Azura in either department. She had blond hair and tail, skin same as Rhea's if not a bit more pail. Her mare coat was golden brown and white, with the patter similar to that of a Paint Horse. Her breasts and mare teats were D sized like Azura's. She was more of the big sister type to many of the kids, rather than motherly or playful like her fellow caretakers.

All three had the breast size and teat size, because at their Daycare, they allowed the children of all age groups to nurse from them, be it the human or mare breast. Both sets provided the same nutritious milk for the little ones. They were one of the few Daycares that did so, after getting consent from the parents. Including your mother Linda. This was a community that believed in letting kids be kids, and not making them grow so fast.

Well, most of them. You had noticed, as you took a glimpse when Rhea flicked her tail to the side, that she had what looked like a big tunnel of some kind you could fit into, but it looked like it was closed for the moment. Above it appeared to be a smaller hole, closed tight too. Beneath both was her mare teats. After seeing these closed of tunnels on Rhea's rear, you figured all three caretakers had those closed of tunnels just like hers, as well as the little centaur girls.

After playing some games with your friends. You remember wanting to ask where babies come from, be they human, or centaur babies. You decide the best one to ask was........

You decided that the best person to ask would be Rhea and as such you start making your way over to her, as you got closer you saw that she was talking with your sister and a centaur boy and a centaur girl, it seems like they're done talking now as your sister had just turned around and suddenly started running over to you with the 2 centaurs trotting behind her trying to keep up and trying not to overtake her at the same time.

Your sister had just run across the room with a joyous smile stricken across her face "Tom Tom Tom" she pauses for a second to catch her breath "wanna play a game" she says after moving her face only inches from yours, being so close you could even clearly see the shapes of the glitter pieces in her lip gloss which, to be honest, doesn't make her look older in any way shape or form even if she likes to think it does, she seems to get impatient as all you've been doing for the last few seconds is stare at her lips "so... wanna play" she acts in an innocent way trying to ignore the fact that you had just been staring at her lips, "so do you want to play or not" the female centaur behind your sister asks in an almost demanding tone.

The female centaur behind your sister is called Grace and by the way she speaks it's definitely not a fitting name, she acts all high and mighty because she's from a rich family, even though she's only 3 she makes her best effort to look the best she can and she even goes as far as wearing lipstick but unlike your sister it most definitely attracts unwanted attention, her parents even went as far a hiring her a bodyguard to escort her whenever she goes outside which in your opinion is just giving her a bloated ego and further begs the question, why do they let her wear lipstick in the first place?

The male centaur behind your sister is called Chad and he just turned 4 last week, even though he is kind and popular with everyone, for some reason you don't particularly like him and to your annoyance, by the way he acts around you it appears as if he can't stand someone not liking him or at least being his friend, ever since you started openly ignoring him has his attempts at gaining your friendship become slightly more obsessive, it feels like he's constantly trying to win your friendship, one time he even gave you a cupcake with red icing in the shape of a heart on top, to your knowledge his parents have never taken him to have his hair cut which is pretty bad because centaur hair grows faster than humans and as such he now wears it in a ponytail.

All 3 of them are very good friends, Tina and Grace love talking about fashion though most of the time your sister has no idea what Grace is going on about, when it was Chad's birthday last week they decided to dress him up in a dress and made him let his hair down, the dress he wore was an expensive one owned by Grace, it was designed to cover the entire horse body and human torso, most centaurs don't wear these kinds of clothes because they find it harder to move in and because they're so big they cost a lot to make, if that was the first time you had met him you would have probably mistaken him for a girl, strangely during his birthday whenever he saw you his cheeks would light up bright red.

While you were doing your internal monologue all 3 of them were patiently waiting for you to answer "do you not want to play with me" Chad asks in a nearly inaudible voice, looking over to Chad you notice that for some reason he has his hair down today, observing him up and down you realize whoever came up with his name had no idea he was going to turn out so androgynous.

15523221253111.content:
You quickly told them no, knowing most likely Grace would demand you all play something really girlly, and while Chad would be alright with that, you were not. It's not that you hated any of them, but sometimes, it felt annoying they would ask you to play, only to have you do girly things with them. And they'd probably be chatting up a storm later with you, knowing most likely they were politely asking Rhea for first chance to nurse from her, during the next nursing session, and included you in that request, which wouldn't bother you much.

While Grace tried act like she as all high and mighty, trying to lure you into playing with them, you stood your ground. A strength, Rhea took notice of, many a times, and complimented you for not backing down from someone trying to get under your skin. You were only 4, but the strong spirit was already showing. And she had seen it many a times, from the time you took your first steps as a baby toddler, to when you braved your first taste of broccoli, granted the taste was nasty to you, but you gave it a chance, unlike most children here, human or centaur, including your sister, but your words of encouragement did help her to try things as well. She was your sister after all, and in most cases, siblings stood by each other.

After Grace finally gave up, and Chad acknowledged you wanted to be alone, you headed back over to Rhea to talk to her. "Hello Tom. Is there something I can help you with dear. Nursing time isn't for a couple hours, so you'll have to wait. Did you need a pull-up change?" She asked.

Many times she had changed your pull ups if you didn't notice you went or just didn't get to the potty in time, which was more often than not, and you felt thankful she didn't tease you about it, and ensure other kids didn't tease you either because you were slow in developing your potty control. As of right now though, you were dry, and even though you shook your head she checked just to be sure, which you didn't mind. After verifying you were dry, she asked, "What's on your mind dear?"

"Well, um, I was wondering if you could tell me. W-Where do babies come from?" You asked innocently.

Rhea was a bit surprised, but not shocked someone your age might ask. She tried to think of a way to state it in a fashion that made sense to your young mind, as she led you to a more private area to explain while her fellow caretakers looked after the others. "Well dear. It's a little different between Centaurs and humans. For human moms, the baby is born from this tummy," She directs her hand to her human abdominal area. She continued, "For Centaur babies, they come from this tummy," she pointed to her mare abdominal area.

"So, I came from right here when I was a baby," you asked, as you pointed to her human abdomen.

She chuckled cause that tickled a bit. "Well, not from my tummy dear. You came from your Mommy, Linda's tummy. That's why you call her Mommy," Rhea explained.

"Oh, so if I came from one of your tummies, I'd call you Mommy?" you inquired.

"Well, Centaurs don't have human kids, but, yes, if you did come from my tummy, you would call me mommy," Rhea stated.

After learning these facts, you asked, "How does the baby get out of the tummy?"

Rhea had hoped you might not ask this question, but she felt, if asked, she couldn't just lie to you. So, she took a breath and explained, "Well, if you look on my rear, right above my mare breasts, there are two, um, tunnels. they higher one is where food comes out the other end. You know, number two."

"Oh," you answered in understanding, now knowing what one of the tunnels on her rear you saw earlier was for.

"The lower, much bigger tunnel is what I call my marehood. It leads to a chamber called my womb, and that's where little babies grow from. Human girls have it between their legs. And when we, mares and human girls, have a baby in our tummy, our tummies look rounder," She helped explain.

She left out the part that there must be a male present to help make the baby in the first place, but your innocent little mind didn't need to know those details right now.

Just as Rhea hoped you got all your questions answered and might change the subject.......

Rhea was surprise at this turn of events, she hadn't expected you to ask that question. She had expected you to ask why you called your dad your dad, which she was relieved you didn't, but still, this was unexpected.

However, this had peaked a certain opportunity for her. She had always seen you as, well, a son she never had. She had no actual children of her own. She could never find a mate that really understood her. While she was a wet nurse thanks to some potions she had made for her and her fellow caretakers, she had been without a child of her own. But you always made her feel like a mother whenever you were at Daycare. None of the other children really made her feel that way.

And she was also aware of the art of unbirth. However, most humans unbirthed were unbirthed as a form of punishment of those who committed crimes against Centaurs in a racist fashion, to give them a taste of what it was like to be one of them for the rest of their lives, and correcting their mindsets upon rebirth and growing up. Centaurs were a proud, and noble race, but they never saw human kind as their betters or lessers...... in most cases. Grace the little filly being a borderline exception, who was friends with your sister, and little Chad.

But, she had never contemplated a case of unbirth out of request. Adoption maybe, but request? Not that she could blame you for asking. She had seen how mistreating your mother had been to you personally, your father even worse, one time completely forgetting you as he picked up TIna when you were on the potty. Tina, well, she may have been treated better cause she stayed with the "popular" kids at daycare, but Rhea felt that as no excuse for your mistreatment. And your strength an resilience in your young personality was something to consider. Something she would want in a son of hers. Had you been a girl, this may have been a little less a factor.

Getting her thoughts straight, she told you to wait a moment. She opened the door to the room you two were in, and then called to the other caretakers. You heard some chatter going back and forth, all sounding very sympathetic, and getting a clear view of Rhea's backside, seeing the tunnel again, which looked indeed, big enough for you to crawl through. You then hear Rhea giggle a bit, before closing the door, and turning around to you. "Alright, we'll see if we can get you in my tummy. I'll be your mommy if that's what you really want. But understand, you're gonna be in "new mommy's" tummy a while. You'll be becoming my little centaur colt. Are you sure you wanna do this honey?" She asked, with a face pleading you'd say yes.

You nodded enthusiastically. Anything to get away from you unloving parents, and to have some space between Grace's annoyance. "Okay then...."

1552322125344.content:
Sure, you've read stories of how warrior spirited the Viking Women were, and thought it was myth.

But in this town, the mythic shield maidens were very real. And very tall. And while your mother possessed spirit that force your father to agree to move here, the spirit she had was not the Viking Woman spirit. Far from it. She had a long way to go.

Viking Woman, while warrior like, that strength, while not to the level of Herculean or Thor like Strength, was used towards rearing their little ones to be strong willed children. They had Viking Men Around as well. But the area of the city you moved close to was grown women only. You were on the borders, and the Daycare was in the heart of the district of this part of the community. Boys 15 and younger were an exception, since they still needed their mother's care.

But the thing was, when the woman meant strong willed, they meant to make the world a more caring place. Not one where they'd be bullying brutes. So, the woman here were unmatched in the art of child rearing.

You learned this first day of Daycare. Here, they didn't make you grow up fast. They let you take your time. You and Tina, were placed in riding pouches on the caretakers' backs. Some times you and Tina were placed in the same pouch together, sometimes separate pouches. The pouches also helped to double as the caretakers' hoods when children were not with them. The area you were in saw snow 9 to 10 months out of the year. But, these pouches weren't for just carrying you around in with nothing to do. The Caretakers liked to remain active, and found a way to get exercise, while the kids they cared for were having loads of fun. The caretakers would run while the children riding in their pouches threw snowballs at each other, or at the caretakers not carrying children with the, to help the caretakers practice hunting, and evading enemy forces. This also helped the Caretakers master their agility and endurance. And kept them really strong. The pouches you rode in also doubled as a cozy nap area, should you get tired during the chases or snowball fights.

And the caretakers here all produced breastmilk. It was very nutritious, and only the woman of the Vikings were able to have these, so women were either born one of them, or had to earn them, after going through trials.

This of course was for the outside. There was a time inside. And each of the caretakers took turns at caring for the babies of the children, too young to be outside yet. And when everyone was inside. You all were in a, pretty much, baby proofed room. It was like a giant playpen. For those 7 and younger, were given pillow swords, to have little pillow sparing matches. You and Tina were the first two no Viking kids to have come to this Daycare, so, while you were of the 4 year old age group, the Caretakers had to assess you both first. And both of you showed promise right away. Even though you were not born Viking, you had the true spirit the looked for in both Viking men and woman. There was Largatha, Rocksha, and Hilda to name just a few of the caretakers.

Largatha (like from the show Vikings on History channel) was a strong blonde who was considered one of the most agile among the caretakers. She was mischievous, sometimes changing up the tactics her sisters didn't see coming, but they loved her creativity. She had D sized breasts, and her motherly spirit was one of soft speaking. Only time she ever got stern in voice was when there was misbehavior she spotted.

Rocksha was a burnette. The tallest among the Viking woman, and considered an "Earl" of the area. Some men, even of the Vikings would say she was the giantess among them, but out of respect, not insult. And she had DD sized breasts. She was fastest, strongest, fiercest, and the most motherly of all the Viking Women. To harm little ones in front of her was to earn a swift trip to meet the Goddess of death herself.

And in this realm of reality, The Norse Gods were very reals. Even some came to visit this area of Midgard that bordered closest to the realm of Asgard.

Hilda, red haired Viking, was also very motherly, and very much for brute force, sometimes just using her body to bulldoze through a snow mound as if it were nothing when they did the outdoor activities ensuring not to get the little one's riding pouch full of snow. She was just one peg below Rocksha in strength, but never got testy with her Earl. She had D sized breasts like Largatha.

But let's also be clear on a few things, the orphanage/lost child facility are not gonna act as cruel/abusive people, and nor will the family who decides to adopt the child/children.

Now, it's onto the child/children that are going to be adopted.

Adoption 1:(A Sweet Little Boy Lost in the Magical Land of Disney World)
Chad is a 5 year old boy, with brunette hair and blue eyes, and the typical five year old attire, training pants and all, who was touring Disney World, when park officials noticed his parents were not with him. He was brought to the Lost Child/Daycare center to be looked after by the motherly staff. However, while he waited there, his parent(s) never came to look for him. There is a Disney World Adoption Center, but his new mom may have already taken him as her own by putting him in her tummy, answering the question in the back of his mind about where babies come from.

Adoption 2: (Twin Brothers Troy and Ken waiting for a new mommy)
Troy is a 6 year old with a twin brother named Ken. They have been orphaned since they were 1, after their parents passed away. With no living relatives, they have been waiting for someone to become their parent(s). Troy has a shaved head, his hair albino, like his brother, and green eyes. He's the more shy among the two, and never goes anywhere without his brother. He has wondered where babies come from, and perhaps the new mom that adopts them at from the nice orphanage will reveal that mystery.
Ken is Troy's twin brother, so you know the age and hair color, though, his hair is the longer of the two. He's the more mischievous of the two, but their antics are nothing the Orphanage would deem punishable, unlike some other kids who have come through, and he always has Troy's back, keeping bullies away from his brother, and never letting Troy out of his sight. He too wonders where babies come from, and when their new mom adopts them together, she may just show them, rather than tell them.

You're either a child wanting to return to a womb or a mother wanting to be pregnant again, or a girl (teenage or child) wanting to be pregnant.
This can be achieved by something that alters reality or a wish

You can add vore if you want but no death of the main character

No described sexual scene with underage character.
No male pregnancy.
No animal unbirthing

Thanks to notabot, ghan and AdridWD for their contribution.
You can add to my chapter, their mostly settings.

You can use one of this family or make your own.
Family 1:
Linda is mother who had fraternal twins, Tom a boy and Tina a girl, she was enjoying too much her pregnancy and never get this feeling again.
Tom ask one time a question about where the baby come from and about the womb, the answer will torment him until he is in a womb again.
Tina ask the same question as her brother and one about pregnant feeling, the answer will torment her until she is in a womb again or she get Tom in her womb.
Jame the father was bored of taking care of his pregnant wife and he did not want she to be again pregnant.
Linda and Jame got their children at 18,you can have the family at any age but the twins must not exceed 18 years.

Family 2:
Mandy is a single mom who has lots of overexcited kids, she is tired of having to raise them. Occasionally she thinks she was happiest when his children were in her womb.

Family 3 :
Miria is a 8 month pregnant, she's 16 and pretty, she was electrocuted, she survive but her unborn child(or children) become aware. Her child(children) won't get out naturaly cause her child don't know how to get out,she's never gonna be induced into labor.She is against the caesarean, she decided that the only way her child out of her womb will be the natural way.She's going to eat a lot, she won't get chubby but her child will continue to grow as if he was out and her belly will grow without limit.If she had sex she will be impregnated but the egg cell will go inside of one of her daughter and only her will be able to be born.

Family 4 :
John is 16 but happen to shrink, he doesn't know yet but the only way that will make him grow back is to have someone pregnant with him. His mom(Lidia) is 40 and 9month pregnant with Jane your future sister(or mother if you chose her womb), you also have a 6,10 and 18 years old sister. John can shrink anywhere.

You can find other way than reality altering device or wish.
You can also have fun with the device but it's never alter the mind and the people memories. People find strange your pregnant again or your children missing.
